name: Eva’s Daily Game Dev Routine #2
description:
Well  its Time for Spooky Season! Eva Has A Halloween Party Planned and She wants Her Friends Bestblood and Aaron to Join her On This Spooky Night Of Halloween. But Little Does Little Eva know there's Some else that's Evil and Wicked that Wishes to Do Harm to Her and Friends.

There is 4 Endings in this Game:
Neutral Ending

Good Ending

The True Good Ending

The Revenge Ending 

With Evil Eva Gone, Eva Can Finally Focus on Her Game Dev Skills. But With Halloween Just Around the Corner, Eva Wants to Have A Halloween Party With Her Friends and Enjoy The Spooky Season. But Little Does Eva Know That Evil Eva Didn't Just Torment Her and try to off Her. Evil Eva has A  Scheme set in motion Behind the Scenes For Little Eva that she Knows Nothing about.  Will This Interfere With Her Halloween Party? 

- Ps1 Style Feel

- A World That Gets Very Corrupted As The Days Get Closer to Halloween

- Game That Has 4 Endings

- A Game That Has Checkpoints [ Start From Monday, Start From Wednesday and Start From Sunday]

- My First Boss Fight Mechanic 

- Being able to Go Outside, Upstairs , Through the Patio in Eva's New Expanded House.

- New Tasks added to The To Do list Throughout the Days.  Including The All New Night Checks.

Shift = Sprint

W,A,S,D = Movement

Esc = Pause

F = Flashlight

P = Switch off VHS Effect

1 and 2 To Cast Spells [Boss Fight Only]

To The Following Amazing People Who Voiced in the Game

- Bestblood17

- Aaron Wise Aka Trial By Fire Games

- My Doggo Rocko

- Call Me Crimz
